DOC.detailed_description: The first study aim ( 1 ) test , randomize control trial , whether provision portion-controlled prepackaged lunch dinner entree context reduced-energy diet prescription counseling associate great degree weight loss 12 week overweight obese men woman , compare usual care control condition prescribe reduced-energy diet consume via self-selected food . This study utilize randomize study design participant assign prepackaged food intervention arm usual care control group . The second study aim ( 2 ) describe effect participation prepackaged food arm ( versus control condition ) circulate lipid ( fast total plasma cholesterol triglyceride , low-density lipoprotein [ LDL ] cholesterol , high-density lipoprotein [ HDL ] cholesterol ) , carotenoid ( biomarker vegetable fruit intake ) , C-reactive protein , cardiopulmonary fitness . Secondary aim study ( 3 ) describe association prepackaged food consumption meal satiety , eat attitude behavior , meal satisfaction . The hypothesis test eat reduced-energy diet incorporate unit-defined , prepackaged food associate meal satiety satisfaction superior diet base self-selected food . As exploratory aim , also examine whether differential response different dietary macronutrient composition prepackaged food item use structure meal plan intervention participant . Lean Cuisine meal product offer participant assign one intervention group , Lean Cuisine item protein contribute > 25 % energy offer participant intervention group . Notably , result study may contribute valuable data scientific knowledge base regard various aspect diet diet composition may promote successful weight loss . How diet best modified promote weight loss important issue currently consider debate among clinical community-based behavioral nutritional scientist , optimal composition weight loss diet establish ( IOM 2002 ) . Adherence dietary regimen energy imbalance central determinant successful weight loss , evidence-based approach may promote good adherence less deprivation meal satisfaction could help public health clinical effort reduce high prevalence overweight obesity U.S. today .
